analog.h File Reference

Analog functions. More...

Functions

UInt16 GetAnalog (UInt8 port)
 Get a analog value from an analog input.

Detailed Description

Analog functions.

The POB-Robotics-Suite comes with 8 analog input ports. Each analog input measures a voltage between 0 Volts to 3.3 Volts and convert it to a 10-bits value.

If you want use instead the digital input/output pins, see the input/output functions.

Input analog example
 #include <pobRoboticSuite.h>

 int main(void)
 {
        UInt16 result;

        // Init CPU:
        InitCpu();

        // Search and Init Devices connected on the POB-Robotics-Suite ports:
        InitRobot();


        // Read the analog value of port 2:
        result = GetAnalog(2);

        return 0;
 }

Function Documentation

UInt16 GetAnalog ( UInt8  port  ) 

Get a analog value from an analog input.

Parameters:
port An analog port (between 1 to 8).
Returns:
Analog value between 0 and 1024.
